description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Pasta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Fish,Soy free,Tree nut free,Tomato,Back to school,Jan Feb 2020,Budget
name: Tuna Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in boiling water until tender, adding beans for the last 2 minutes. Drain, rinse and cool.
Add drained tuna, cheese, mayonnaise and lemon juice. Quarter cherry tomatoes and add with corn kernels. Spoon into sealable containers.
